All I just wanted to let you all know about the all points bulletin I put =
out July 25th about the Chris Ghost Box 1 radio I shipped to Ursula Kalin i=
s found! 

It shipped to her via the US Postal Service on July 20th, and ar=
rived yesterday at Ursula's house in IL.

I had asked each of you to keep a=
n eye on ebay for it.

Ursula, I am so happy you now have it.

Mike Edwards=
